title: Sticky Toffee Pudding
directions: Chop dates into small pieces. Pour 1/2 a pint of boiling water over them. Add bicarbonate of soda and vanilla essence.
Cream together granulated sugar, butter, egg and self-raising flour.
Stir in date mixture. Pour into tin and bake for 35 mins. at 160C.
Mix together brown sugar, margarine and double cream.
When ready take cake mixture out of oven and skewer evenly. Pour over toffee mix and bake for another 15 mins.
